name: Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion Equity Strategy
description: Daily mean-reversion system for large-cap U.S. equities that combines 20-period Bollinger Bands and 14-period RSI. Long when price closes below the lower band and RSI<30; short when price closes above the upper band and RSI>70. Positions are exited on reversion to the mid-band or RSI returning to neutral. Risk is capped via 3 % stop loss and 4 % take-profit OCO orders. Each trade allocates 2 % of account equity.
